009package Color_Images;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import java.awt.image.IndexColorModel;
015
016public class Brighten_Index_Image implements PlugInFilter {
017        
018        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
019                return DOES_8G + DOES_8C;       // this plugin works on indexed color images 
020        }
021
022        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
023                IndexColorModel icm = (IndexColorModel) ip.getColorModel(); 
024                //IJ.write("Color Model=" + ip.getColorModel() + " " + ip.isColorLut());
025        
026                int pixBits = icm.getPixelSize(); 
027                int nColors = icm.getMapSize(); 
028                
029                //retrieve the current lookup tables (maps) for R,G,B
030                byte[] Pred = new byte[nColors]; icm.getReds(Pred);  
031                byte[] Pgrn = new byte[nColors]; icm.getGreens(Pgrn);  
032                byte[] Pblu = new byte[nColors]; icm.getBlues(Pblu);  
033                
034                //modify the lookup tables      
035                for (int idx = 0; idx < nColors; idx++){ 
036                        int r = 0xff & Pred[idx];       //mask to treat as unsigned byte 
037                        int g = 0xff & Pgrn[idx];
038                        int b = 0xff & Pblu[idx];   
039                        Pred[idx] = (byte) Math.min(r + 10, 255); 
040                        Pgrn[idx] = (byte) Math.min(g + 10, 255);
041                        Pblu[idx] = (byte) Math.min(b + 10, 255); 
042                }
043                
044                //create a new color model and apply to the image
045                IndexColorModel icm2 = new IndexColorModel(pixBits, nColors, Pred, Pgrn, Pblu);  
046                ip.setColorModel(icm2);
047        }
048
049}
050
